locs.text: jab aapakee chaay ya kophee ka kap taiyaar hota hai to aapako sachet karane ke lie ek alaarm jodata hai.
ek alaarm ko nirast karata hai jo aapako tab sachet karata hai jab aapaka chaay ya kophee ka kap taiyaar ho jaata hai.
koee kaifeen alart nirast karane ke lie nahin.
aapaka kap taiyaar hone mein lagane vaale sekand amaany hain.
yadi aap pey ka naam bataane ka prayaas kar rahe hain, to neeche dee gaee soochee dekhen:
ya to sekand kee sankhya ya pey naam nirdisht karen
